title: The Bible - Walking by Faith in the Armory of Truth Part 3
description:
Finally, it is time for the Truth to be told.  Walking By faith is our Christian duty but how many of us actually know or understand these truths?  This may be of utmost importance for the modern Christian in the approaching End Times calamities but too often obscured in the church.

There are many satanic deceptions which plague our world but have also infiltrated our church as prophecised in the Bible.  Now is the time to learn about these modern events from the Christian perspective as Jesus taught.  We must prepare the remnant as we share the gospel as God's light to the world.  Stop being fooled by the indoctrination of circumstance and learn to spiritually overcome these dark forces in our pursuit of God's heavenly kingdom and eternal life.

This torrent includes the follwing featured videos...

Rebellion in Churches:
The secret evils of American church groups as presented by shieldoftheson.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Serpent Seed Doctrine:
"Serpent Seed" Doctrine gives listeners a fundamental overview of the original sin and the truth about the deceptions of a possible dual-seedline.
------------------------------------------------------------------------

Testing the Serpent Seed Doctrine:
The "Serpent Seed" doctrine is not a doctrine that is widely popular, however, it is a teaching that has become more commonplace. Because of this, for whatever it is worth, we test this doctrine to the Word of God
